info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 12:56PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Moderate to heavy snow showers will impact portions of southern Lewis and Clark, west central Broadwater and northern Jefferson Counties through 145 PM MST... At 1254 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking Moderate to heavy snow showers along a line extending from 11 miles north of Townsend to near Basin. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Moderate to heavy snow showers. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility down to a half mile or less and slippery roads. Locations impacted include... Townsend, Boulder, Toston, Basin, Wickes, Rimini, Alhambra, Corbin, Elkhorn State Park, Winston, Radersburg, Silos, Clancy, and Jefferson City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected.
